info.name: Radial in 111 chars
info.description:
Here's my One Tweet version of aiekick's shader:
https://www.shadertoy.com/view/lsG3RW

renderpass.code:
void mainImage(out vec4 o, vec2 u) {
    o = texture(iChannel0, (length(o.xy=u/iResolution.y-.5) + vec2(atan(o.x, o.y),0))*.1-iTime*.01); }
renderpass.name: Image
